name: Lob
headline: Lob is the only automation platform that transforms direct mail intoâ¦
description:
Lob provides the building blocks for developers to automate the offline world. Enterprise companies use Lobâs suite of APIs to mail fully dynamic and personalized customer communications with print media. We provide insight into deliverability with piece-by-piece tracing and utilize our proprietary Print Delivery Network to streamline production across fully redundant nodes all over the country. 

Founded in 2013 and based in San Francisco, Lob is venture backed by Y Combinator, Polaris Partners, Floodgate, and First Round Capital.

Find out more about Lob and what weâre up to by following our blog: https://lob.com/blog or visiting our website: https://lob.com.

### Reinvent the mail. Join 12,000+ companies leading the charge with Lob.
![Cedar Company Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669efecc654a80a58713ecb6_cedar_company_logo.svg)![ThredUP Company Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669efecbdd124cbeae37b357_thredup_company_logo.svg)![Lemonade Company Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669efecc2d6858d43db70953_lemonade_company_logo.svg)![New York Times Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669efeccaea54dd514d1c51d_nyt_company_logo.svg)![Included Health Company Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669efecc56edb7ab332393f4_included_health.svg)![Mabel Company Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669efecb50a18138cce2ba0f_mabel_company_logo.svg)

How it works
## Create, send, measure
  1. CreateConnect Lob with the digital tools you already use to create personalized, automated direct mail that fits seamlessly with your omnichannel marketing strategy.
  2. SendTake paper shortages, campaign delays, and logistical hiccups off your plate. Lob manages the printing and sending process from end to end so you can focus on growth.
  3. MeasureDemonstrate the value of every send and find winning strategies for future campaigns with advanced analytics in your Lob dashboard.

[Take a closer look at Lob's platform](http://lob.com/</product/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/669fd0d89e945f98310187ca_Product-1-550px%20Revised.svg)
### Mail to millions (but make it personal)
Automate hyper-targeted and personalized mail at any scale and watch conversion soar. Lob brings the data and ease of digital to your direct mail campaigns.
### **Integrate with ease + boost digital**
Lob integrates smoothly with your existing tech stack, making it easy to add direct mail to your digital campaigns. Choose from turnkey solutions or our award-winning API.
### Mail smarter with advanced analytics
Track your direct mail's success with Lob Analytics. Get clear insights and adapt strategies in real time to make every send better than the last.
### **Deliver fast + put security first**
Automate your campaigns to take the grunt work out of direct mail, then use our print network to smooth logistics and keep your mail compliant.
#### Increase the impact of your direct mail — while decreasing your workload
Hear from brands who are using Lob to connect with customers like never before, without breaking a sweat (or the bank).
![Marley Spoon Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/66a0c1381db1b5effd2fdf46_marleyspoon_company_logo.svg)
“Lob automated direct mail has increased our productivity and saved us money. It’s a huge help to get our direct mail campaigns out quickly and easily.”
– Malin Dettmann-Levin
![Oscar Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/66a0bf99b47c05d6c50a0165_Vector.svg)
“Lob makes us much more efficient across the board.”
– Brenton Caldwell
![Encamp Logo in white](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e1e5c62fa3d4447af417098/64b802baac6bb0bd484a1c4d_EnCamp%20LogoWhite%201.svg)
“It would be impossible for us to do our job without Lob.”
– Ben Jacobs, Chief Technology Officer
## Send lightning-fast campaigns that drive results with Lob
Send targeted campaigns at supersonic speeds — no matter how big your brand or list gets. Get a customized demo of our intuitive platform to find out how lob can help your business grow.
For more information about how this data is handled, please view our [Privacy Policy](http://lob.com/</privacy>)

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Lob

**Overview**  
Founded in 2013 and based in San Francisco, Lob is a cutting-edge automation platform that reimagines direct mail. Its mission is to simplify and enhance offline communications through technology by offering a suite of APIs that allow enterprises to manage fully dynamic and personalized customer interactions with printed media. This isn’t just about sending mail; it’s about automating the entire process to drive real engagement and results.

**What They Do**  
Lob enables businesses to incorporate direct mail into their marketing strategies seamlessly. They focus on three key aspects:

1. **Automation**: By integrating directly with existing digital tools, Lob allows for hyper-targeted mailings that scale effortlessly.
2. **Measurement**: Their platform provides analytics to track and measure the success of each campaign, ensuring businesses can adapt and optimize their strategies in real-time.
3. **Streamlined Delivery**: With their proprietary Print Delivery Network, they ensure high deliverability and quick turnaround times, taking logistical headaches off customer plates.

**Team and Culture**  
With a team of 150 employees and backing from notable investors like Y Combinator and First Round Capital, Lob has positioned itself as a leader in the direct mail automation sector. They’ve been recognized multiple times as one of the best places to work in the Bay Area, highlighting their commitment to a strong workplace culture that emphasizes innovation and employee satisfaction.

**Looking Ahead**  
Lob aims to reinvent direct mail, catering to 12,000+ businesses, including major names like New York Times and Lemonade. They keep evolving their offerings, always pushing for better ways to connect direct mail with digital campaigns, ultimately driving higher ROIs for their clients.

**Get Involved**  
Anyone interested in learning more about Lob, including insights on their latest developments, can visit their [website](https://lob.com) and check out their [blog](https://lob.com/blog).

The traditional mailbox is seeing a revival, and with Lob at the helm, it’s turning into a dynamic channel that complements digital marketing strategies. If businesses want to cut through the noise, Lob offers the tools to make that happen—efficiently, effectively, and beautifully.
